convertRules: # Line head conversion # Note: this rule can't apply to the very first line of the document '\n》|' -> '\n>|' '\n、|' -> '\n/|' # Auto-pair, Input Conversion, and Deletion '[|' -> '[|]' '{|' -> '{|}' '(|' -> '（|）' '/*|' -> '/* | */' # Auto code block '\.|' -> '`|`' # inline block '\b.|' -> '```\n|\n```' '\c.|' -> '```css\n|\n```' '\h.|' -> '```html\n|\n```' '\j.|' -> '```js\n|\n```' '\t.|' -> '```ts\n|\n```' '\s.|' -> '```shell\n|\n```' '\js.|' -> '```json\n|\n```' '.ad|' -> '```ad-|\n\n```' '.`ad|' -> '````ad-|\n\n````' '\<|'-> '<|>' 'pws|' -> 'powershell|' # have fun converting! '\sp|' -> '|' '\csp|' -> '' '\cisp|' -> '' '\cbsp|' -> '' '\cbisp|' -> '' '\cbiusp|' -> '' # Selection Insert Rules '`' -> '`' + '`' '$' -> '$' + '$' '<' -> '<' + '>' '>' -> '' #'c' -> '' + ''

profiles.title: global
profiles.content: # Line head conversion # Note: this rule can't apply to the very first line of the document '\n》|' -> '\n>|' '\n、|' -> '\n/|' # Auto-pair, Input Conversion, and Deletion '[|' -> '[|]' '{|' -> '{|}' '(|' -> '（|）' '/*|' -> '/* | */' # Auto code block '\.|' -> '`|`' # inline block '\b.|' -> '```\n|\n```' '\c.|' -> '```css\n|\n```' '\h.|' -> '```html\n|\n```' '\j.|' -> '```js\n|\n```' '\t.|' -> '```ts\n|\n```' '\s.|' -> '```shell\n|\n```' '\js.|' -> '```json\n|\n```' '.ad|' -> '```ad-|\n\n```' '.`ad|' -> '````ad-|\n\n````' '\<|'-> '<|>' 'pws|' -> 'powershell|' # have fun converting! '\sp|' -> '|' '\csp|' -> '' '\cisp|' -> '' '\cbsp|' -> '' '\cbisp|' -> '' '\cbiusp|' -> '' # Selection Insert Rules '`' -> '`' + '`' '$' -> '$' + '$' '<' -> '<' + '>' '>' -> '' #'c' -> '' + ''
